summary: Covering the years from 1932 through 1957, this is the story of the trials and tribulations of lighthouse keeper Keiji Sada and his wife Hideko Takamine.
cast: Hideko Takamine|Keiji Sada|Takahiro Tamura|Katsuo Nakamura|Yôko Katsuragi|Kôji Mitsui|Kuniko Igawa|Shizue Natsukawa|Masako Arisawa|Hiroko Itô|Ushio Akashi|Ryûji Kita|Takashi Miki|Noboru Nakaya|Takeshi Sakamoto|Mutsuko Sakura
title: Tiempos de alegría y dolor
